mapper.sql: SELECT question_id, creator_id, question_type, difficulty, content, options, answer, default_score, is_active, created_at, updated_at, extra_info FROM question
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (creator_id, question_type, difficulty, content, options, answer, default_score, is_active, extra_info) VALUES (#{creatorId}, #{questionType}, #{difficulty}, #{content}, #{options}, #{answer}, #{defaultScore}, 1, #{extraInfo})
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET question_type = #{questionType}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, content = #{content}, options = #{options}, answer = #{answer}, default_score = #{defaultScore}, extra_info = #{extraInfo}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
UPDATE question SET is_active = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE question_id = #{id}
